channel.title: Hoster Needed!
channel.description:
[B]Yo ,
I need an Hoster like the Title says.
*Pictures* [img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk61/zamirscape/runemax.jpg[/img] [img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk61/zamirscape/runemax1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk61/zamirscape/runemax3.jpg[/img] Ive token this when it was Online we reached up in 40 Minutes that and we almost always have 20+ Players Online! Since it went down i need an New Better Good Hoster
Fill this Format in
*Format for Host Apply* Can you Host 24/7 ? : Through your Computer ? : If yes what Version XP or Vista ? : If not Through VPS or Dedi? : Bandwith in GB ? : Will you never give out my Source even if we got Fights? : You will not try to scam me or whatever ? : You'll Support me in the Good Days and Bad Days? :
Well this is it atm i might make it an Little Bigger. So come on Hosters!!
*How to Contact me* MSN/E-Mail : [email]zamir_afg@hotmail.com[/email] You can also PM me! Thats it atm .
Thanks for Reading ,
Zamir.[/B]

item.title: Hoster Needed!
item.dc:creator: @i_zam_i i zam i
item.description:
@i_zam_i wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:12, topic:259332”]Format for Host Apply
Can you Host 24/7 ? : Yep.
Through your Computer ? : Yep. DUHH
If yes what Version XP or Vista ? :XP
If not Through VPS or Dedi? : If we can afford.
Bandwith in GB ? : 350 GB
Will you never give out my Source even if we got Fights? : No, That’s a Disgrace
You will not try to scam me or whatever ? : Nah
You’ll Support me in the Good Days and Bad Days? : Everyday.

Okay ,

Please Contact zamir_afg@hotmail.com.
I am likely when i am on Computer on MSN too…sooo[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2009, 12:40:14 pm[/size][hr]Okay guys the others couldnt so i am still waiting for one of you Hosters.

Ooh yeah with that i mean Dedi or VPS i dont mean if u can buy one i mean what sort host u use Your PC/Dedi/VPS and ooh yeah i had my own VPS the max players was 70 + on this so i hope to reach this time more and get more than 30 $ donations which i had last time!!

Read full topic

item.title: Hoster Needed!
item.dc:creator: @i_zam_i i zam i
item.description:
@i_zam_i wrote:

Oohh yeah obvousily i forgot to say new Features!

FEATURES
-New Training Spots.
-New Monsters.
-Alot of New Drops
-Alot of New Silabs Drops (Jagex Items)
-Alot more Cleaned and Stable
-Fixed some Bugs
-Made more than 10 Shops which Devolution 6.0 got only 2-3 ?
-Jad and KBD are not Aggresive still they got High HP so hard to kill them! ( Jad = 5K HP , KBD = 7K HP) (They Drop Rare Items : Party Hats , Dragon etc.)
-Its more Easier and more Fun it.
-Working 100 % Special Attack WORKING GRANITE MAUL SPEC W00T
-Almost all Items got Special Attack!
-Thieving Rewards are more and Easier!

Loads off more ,

Zamir.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2009, 12:50:31 pm[/size][hr]Nope i dont advertise they where Old Pictures when it was Online.
Are you Blind , its offline cuz that i need new Hoster!

Read full topic
